Sister.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess' Caress, 29; 43; 74Talk to a drow female:1) while the other drow is hired2) shile she is moving to the room after being hired3) with non-avatar

Brother.synopsis: One-liner dialog for the male dapper drow. They have a different dialog for when they are together and are available for hire, and separate ones for the intimacy scene.
Brother.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess' Caress, 29; 43; 74Talk to a drow male:1) while the other drow is hired2) while he is moving to the room after being hired3) with non-avatar

Intimacy.synopsis: The dapper drow intimacy scene. Used for all cases (drow male, female, both with companions + possibly Halsin).
Intimacy.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess Caressfor singular branches: hire one of the drow, otherwise -hire both drow (you need to have a romanced companion or Astarion/Halsin with you), proceed to the room

SiblingsThreeWay.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess' Caress, 29; 43; 74Talk to the any of two drow there.

AD_Siblings.synopsis: A repeated sequential AD between to dapper drow courtesan siblings working in Sharess Caress'.
AD_Siblings.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess Caress, taproom, scene room.

Sister_0.speaker: Nym Orlith
Sister_0.text: It seems the druid needs a moment more to prepare himself. Oh, what will he unleash upon us?

Sister_2.speaker: Nym Orlith
Sister_2.text: Your beloved one seems a touch distracted. I wouldn't wish them to miss out.

Sister_3.speaker: Nym Orlith
Sister_3.text: Love, I'm utterly parched, maybe buy me a drink in the bar?

Sister_4.speaker: Nym Orlith
Sister_4.text: Not now, my brother is hogging our shared chamber, as he is wont to. It could be a while, but when he's done, I'm sure everyone in the building will hear.

Sister_5.speaker: Nym Orlith
Sister_5.text: Let's wait for Sorn, in all his nonsense.

Sister_6.speaker: Nym Orlith
Sister_6.text: Sorry, love, I'm a bit frazzled right now.

Sister_7.speaker: Nym Orlith
Sister_7.text: Look, you didn't sign a treaty permitting you to march a warband through my lands. You paid for sex.

Brother_0.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_0.text: Your beloved seems hesitant. Please fetch them - I wouldn't want them to miss out on the fun.

Brother_1.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_1.text: This way! This way! Scuttle with haste.

Brother_2.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_2.text: Halsin seems to need some more time to prepare. Urgh. He's making my loins ache.

Brother_3.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_3.text: As much as I enjoy when others watch, that wasn't included in the price.

Brother_4.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_4.text: Sorry, my love, but I always need a drink between clients.

Brother_5.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_5.text: My sister will be here soon - she never turns down an invitation to pleasure.

Brother_6.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_6.text: My sister is with a client at present, in our room upstairs. It will be free shortly. Why not sate some of that thirst at the bar until she is done?

Brother_7.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Brother_7.text: Sorry, love, I'm rather preoccupied at the moment.

Intimacy_57.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_57.text: That was wonderful. Perhaps you'll enjoy a drink in the bar before you brave the streets again.

Intimacy_105.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_105.text: Quite the merry little party we have assembled here.

Intimacy_193.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_193.text: In Qu'ellarz'orl custom from our home, groups of five or more meet quorum to qualify as 'orgies'.

Intimacy_182.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_182.text: Four or fewer are simply a gathering. Legally speaking, at least.

Intimacy_273.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_273.text: I hope you're not afraid of the dark, my darling. I must snuff out the lights before we begin.

Intimacy_238.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_238.text: *You feel the vision granted to you by Shar dull. This is not the kind of darkness the Lady cares for.*

Intimacy_11.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_11.text: *The lady, Nym, moves your hand to where the clasps of her blouse lie.*

Intimacy_215.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_215.text: All right sweethearts. You dare to dance with a professional, you'll get your desire.

Intimacy_95.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_95.text: *His skin is like lustred pearls, almost translucent and so delicately smooth.*

Intimacy_179.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_179.text: He's so perfect, it could move even the toughest soul to tears.

Intimacy_60.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_60.text: Hmm. Nature used all of its powers when it sculpted you, Astarion.

Intimacy_84.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_84.text: *It's so easy to see why that body alone ruined so many lives.*

Intimacy_70.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_70.text: You're looking at me rather curiously. Speak up, tell us what you want to do.

Intimacy_243.speaker: Player
Intimacy_243.text: You don't need to wait for my command. Do what you wish.

Intimacy_166.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_166.text: I wish... to drink. And to be drunk.

Intimacy_167.speaker: Player
Intimacy_167.text: Sometimes when I see how beautiful you are, I'm just dumbfounded.

Intimacy_151.speaker: Player
Intimacy_151.text: Only making sure you're all right.

Intimacy_107.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_107.text: My fair consort, I can't wait to dine upon this four-course meal with you.

Intimacy_330.speaker: Player
Intimacy_330.text: I don't know if we should...

Intimacy_195.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_195.text: Just a figure of speech. I promise not to bite down to the bone.

Intimacy_25.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_25.text: Pah! Fake. I pretend to be a vampire before my clients all the time, and I bite twice as hard. Wait... hhnhng.

Intimacy_101.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_101.text: Ha - tickles. See what a bad influence you are, Astarion?

Intimacy_201.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_201.text: You haven't earned the right to stare at me like that.

Intimacy_171.speaker: Player
Intimacy_171.text: Big talk coming from you, who always wants to eat me.

Intimacy_230.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_230.text: I can't help myself - you look so delicious.

Intimacy_278.speaker: Player
Intimacy_278.text: Well, if you don't want my attention, there are several other beautiful elves here.

Intimacy_251.speaker: Astarion
Intimacy_251.text: I hope you like a kiss with teeth, druid.

Intimacy_86.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_86.text: As long as you like to be caressed by claws, Astarion.

Intimacy_29.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_29.text: For this, I feel we should be paying you.

Intimacy_110.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_110.text: *Astarion boldly throws himself into the centre of attention in your little group, and all lavish their pleasures on him.*

Intimacy_240.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_240.text: *But as you sit on his lap, resting afterwards, you look into his eyes, and see no trace of joy. Just an intensity that makes you shiver.*

Intimacy_35.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_35.text: *Astarion lavishes attentions on everyone present with flawless technique, unfazed. It's all pure instinct.*

Intimacy_161.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_161.text: *But when you meet his eye for a moment, there's a look about him that reveals he's a million realms away.*

Intimacy_65.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_65.text: *As soon as you begin, you hear a zap of magic over from where Gale last was.*

Intimacy_81.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_81.text: *With a scamper, he is gone from the room, and in his place is -*

Intimacy_76.speaker: Gale
Intimacy_76.text: Hello! I'm here on behalf of Gale of Waterdeep to participate in this evening's activities. He would like me to assure you all that I am anatomically accurate.

Intimacy_140.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_140.text: Pity. A magical surrogate is no equal to nature's true creation.

Intimacy_10.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_10.text: Fear not - there are still many things we can do with you.

Intimacy_80.speaker: Player
Intimacy_80.text: I was hoping you'd get involved, Gale.

Intimacy_83.speaker: Gale
Intimacy_83.text: I am involved! I'm taking notes. Making observations.

Intimacy_192.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_192.text: Then I hope you are apt with shorthand, wizard. There will be much to observe.

Intimacy_211.speaker: Player
Intimacy_211.text: It's all right if you only wish to watch.

Intimacy_186.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_186.text: Hmm. Hovering yonder like a carrion bird. Perhaps he'll find the courage to peck at some flesh later.

Intimacy_8.speaker: Player
Intimacy_8.text: Halsin! Pin me against the wall.

Intimacy_61.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_61.text: *The drow gasp as Halsin raises you up, your legs catching on his hips, as he clasps you close to his pelvis.*

Intimacy_158.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_158.text: Don't just stare, Gale. That mouth of yours can do better than just hang open, I'll wager.

Intimacy_315.speaker: Gale
Intimacy_315.text: I'll enjoy myself well enough from back here! You go on and do... the rutting or what have you.

Intimacy_306.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_306.text: *As you enjoy yourself with the drow, the image of Gale tuts disapprovingly, but the orb in his naked chest glows with telltale excitement.*

Intimacy_133.speaker: Shadowheart
Intimacy_133.text: You know, I had a dream just like this once.

Intimacy_52.speaker: Shadowheart
Intimacy_52.text: You were in it, so it was certainly... lively.

Intimacy_235.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_235.text: I'm surprised you needed the two of us for this to happen, but I am so glad it has.

Intimacy_37.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_37.text: Oh, empyrean high priestess, let us worship at your altar!

Intimacy_143.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_143.text: *The drow siblings fall to their knees in mock-prayer towards Shadowheart, lavishing caresses over her thighs.*

Intimacy_268.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_268.text: My. And to think some shun organised religion...
Intimacy_268.context: NodeContext: Lightheartedly aroused and taken aback

Intimacy_9.speaker: Player
Intimacy_9.text: Empress of my desires, you shall be revered on this eve!

Intimacy_254.speaker: Shadowheart
Intimacy_254.text: I could get used to this...

Intimacy_175.speaker: Player
Intimacy_175.text: I thought you didn't want to lead a religious order, Shadowheart.

Intimacy_335.speaker: Shadowheart
Intimacy_335.text: I can compromise... just this once.

Intimacy_172.speaker: Player
Intimacy_172.text: Oh, I'm going to destroy the Shar Temple tonight.

Intimacy_234.speaker: Player
Intimacy_234.text: Free of Shar, and now you have worshippers of your own. You must be pleased.

Intimacy_16.speaker: Shadowheart
Intimacy_16.text: I'd be more pleased if you joined them...

Intimacy_134.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_134.text: To watch a woman flush with pleasure is one of nature's sweetest gifts... though perhaps you will prove even sweeter, Shadowheart...

Intimacy_197.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_197.text: *The night skips on, filled with fantasies Shadowheart seemed all too primed to suggest.*

Intimacy_323.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_323.text: I can't quite believe it - a night of passion with the famous Halsin? I might faint before I can expend myself.

Intimacy_245.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_245.text: Legends spread of you throughout the city... We heard tell that you can change into a bear.

Intimacy_247.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_247.text: I hadn't realised I was that popular.

Intimacy_329.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_329.text: But we must give the people what they want, mustn't we?
Intimacy_329.context: CinematicNodeContext: Roaring sound effect after Halsin's line.

Intimacy_248.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_248.text: Will tonight at last be the night I die during an act of pleasure?

Intimacy_89.speaker: Halsin
Intimacy_89.text: Very well... I wouldn't wish to risk damaging the room, I suppose.

Intimacy_88.speaker: Player
Intimacy_88.text: You're both cowards! We do this all the time.

Intimacy_54.speaker: Sorn Orlith
Intimacy_54.text: You're a straight liar. I know this sort of matter requires days of recovery between sessions.

Intimacy_63.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_63.text: Doesn't it...? How does it even fit?

Intimacy_160.speaker: Player
Intimacy_160.text: It doesn't. But Halsin can be quite a fine healer.

Intimacy_293.speaker: Player
Intimacy_293.text: We don't do that when he's a bear!

Intimacy_148.speaker: Player
Intimacy_148.text: Jump atop Halsin and ride him around the room.

Intimacy_79.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_79.text: *Fur tickles your bare nethers as the two drow scream in terror and delight.*

Intimacy_159.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_159.text: *The drow are filled with awe at your and Halsin's habits throughout the night, time and time again.*

Intimacy_337.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cine node where the player, the two drow, your companions, and Halsin as a bear are all cuddling each other.

Intimacy_342.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_342.text: *You feel your Devil's Sight dull. Your Patron really doesn't want to see this.*

Intimacy_274.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_274.text: *Though you have the power to see in the dark, in the face of lust, you can't help but close your eyes...*

Intimacy_290.speaker: Player
Intimacy_290.text: Murmur a quick prayer under your breath that this doesn't break into a brawl.

Intimacy_98.speaker: Player
Intimacy_98.text: These affairs always sound better in theory. Let's not, after all.

Intimacy_68.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_68.text: Understood. No pressure, my love. These things are not for everyone. Come back if you change your mind.

Intimacy_118.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_118.text: We recover quickly. But not that quickly.

Intimacy_332.speaker: Player
Intimacy_332.text: Is there anything else I should know of this place?

Intimacy_41.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_41.text: Even in the best of times, it's an oasis of pleasure and calm in the city's chaos.

Intimacy_71.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_71.text: With Baldur's Gate preparing for war, the Caress feels like the final flicker of a beautiful flame before darkness falls.

Intimacy_213.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_213.text: You came! I'm so pleased. You can never tell who's going to get cold feet.

Intimacy_304.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_304.text: No offence meant, of course - I know cold feet comes with the scales.

Intimacy_173.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_173.text: So, now that you're here... what next?

Intimacy_257.speaker: Player
Intimacy_257.text: I came here to talk, that's all.

Intimacy_298.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_298.text: Of course. Perhaps there is something you want to tell me, that you can't talk to anyone else about?

Intimacy_14.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_14.text: It won't go beyond this room. I probably cannot help, but maybe it will comfort you if there is someone to listen?

Intimacy_291.speaker: Player
Intimacy_291.text: I shouldn't burden you with my woes. That isn't your job.

Intimacy_313.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_313.text: My job is to spend time in your company, in whatever way will leave you feeling fulfilled.

Intimacy_208.speaker: Player
Intimacy_208.text: Can we talk about something less heavy? Tell me a story.

Intimacy_217.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_217.text: *She elects to tell you a story of when she left the Underdark, and how afraid she was of the sun at first.*

Intimacy_299.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_299.text: *She tells her tale with such sweet sincerity, often getting sidetracked and going down on burrowing tangents. You become enwrapped in her words for several hours.*

Intimacy_92.speaker: Player
Intimacy_92.text: My people are in conflict, and I don't know whose words to trust.

Intimacy_282.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_282.text: *Catharsis falls over you as you pour out your heart for hours.*

Intimacy_302.speaker: Player
Intimacy_302.text: I've been called a hero. I'm not so sure I'm worthy of the title.

Intimacy_316.speaker: Player
Intimacy_316.text: Tell her about the machine in your chest. About how there's nothing you can do to stop it from burning you from the inside out.

Intimacy_180.speaker: Player
Intimacy_180.text: There's nothing alluring about pain - I've had my fill of it already, and then some.

Intimacy_283.speaker: Player
Intimacy_283.text: Tell her about the years of loneliness and fear you felt living under Cazador.

Intimacy_126.speaker: Player
Intimacy_126.text: I'm the literal child of the god of murder, and it is a bit much some days.

Intimacy_115.speaker: Player
Intimacy_115.text: I'm still wholly in love with my lost lover...

Intimacy_239.speaker: Player
Intimacy_239.text: The Underdark was terrible, but I miss it dearly.

Intimacy_116.speaker: Player
Intimacy_116.text: People treat me like a big lump of meat sometimes.

Intimacy_152.speaker: Player
Intimacy_152.text: I can't take it when my jokes fall flat. Every awkward silence haunts me at night.

Intimacy_322.speaker: Player
Intimacy_322.text: Sometimes under my robes... I don't wear smallclothes.

Intimacy_190.speaker: Player
Intimacy_190.text: I'm so lonely... I don't really know where I went wrong in love.

Intimacy_303.speaker: Player
Intimacy_303.text: Trying to balance multiple partners has been such a shift, and a challenge.

Intimacy_294.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_294.text: An experience no one else here will give you. A chance to be embraced in the dark, but what that means is up to you.

Intimacy_147.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_147.text: And, of course, there's no charge. Anything for someone who helped find Ffion.

Intimacy_122.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_122.text: So what can I do for you?
Intimacy_122.context: NodeContext: Said with a smile, esp. "Wonderful"

Intimacy_325.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_325.text: A tender touch? Some sensory stimulation?

Intimacy_292.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_292.text: Just because I'm a drow, you think I've got a whip between my legs and a stiletto wedged between my breasts?

Intimacy_236.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_236.text: As I'm relatively new to this business, unlike my brother, I'm not comfortable letting my clients go too far.

Intimacy_120.speaker: Player
Intimacy_120.text: Actually, I think I want my gold back.

Intimacy_219.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_219.text: Tch. I'm sure Sorn will love you, though. He'll leave you wishing you'd asked for something tame.

Intimacy_220.speaker: Player
Intimacy_220.text: Let's have a sweet moment together.

Intimacy_226.context: CinematicNodeContext: Female drow casts darkness, Black screen fading

Intimacy_78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Female drow casts darkness, Black screen fading

Intimacy_97.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_97.text: *In the darkness you can feel hands moving over your body. Touching. Squeezing. Caressing.*

Intimacy_82.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_82.text: Your body is such a treat - I'm so glad you chose to share it with me. So glad we have this time together.

Intimacy_297.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_297.text: *Her hands slip under your clothes, running down your chest, your stomach, between your legs...*

Intimacy_109.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_109.text: *You lie back and feel her lips on your skin, leaving a trail of gentle kisses as her hand pushes further.*

Intimacy_295.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_295.context: NodeContext: Self-satisfied, the player is clearerly aroused

Intimacy_49.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_49.text: *She pulls you close - close enough that you can feel your hearts pounding against each other - and kisses you deeply.*

Intimacy_22.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_22.text: *You're not sure how long your time together lasted, but it was long enough. By the end you felt like you were floating in the dark, utterly at peace.*

Intimacy_72.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_72.text: *Her hands and mouth are all over your body, each touch sending a flush of new sensations racing across your skin.*

Intimacy_261.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_261.text: *You ease your body into the sensation, noticing every tingle and thrill as heat and cold, pressure and pleasure skitter across your nerves.*

Intimacy_137.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_137.text: *You drag your tongue in a winding line from beneath her earlobe down along her collarbone.*

Intimacy_156.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_156.text: *You hold her so tightly, enveloping her in your arms. Her heart starts to flutter faster, like that of a small animal.*

Intimacy_250.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_250.text: *She tastes like a dessert prepared just for you, as she shivers and shakes.*

Intimacy_266.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_266.text: *She lets out a whimper as you kiss lower, lower, lower on her body.*

Intimacy_127.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_127.text: *The hands retract immediately, all sense of presence disappearing with the darkness.*
Intimacy_127.context: CinematicNodeContext: The darkness lifts. The drow is nearby, but there's a little distance between the two of you. He wants to make sure you have space.

Intimacy_15.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_15.context: NodeContext: concerned that he might have gone too far

Intimacy_96.speaker: Player
Intimacy_96.text: It isn't your fault - this is more of a challenge than I was expecting.

Intimacy_73.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_73.text: That is quite understandable. I wish you well.

Intimacy_162.speaker: Player
Intimacy_162.text: Can we just sit quietly for a while?

Intimacy_104.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_104.text: Of course. Give me your hand.

Intimacy_314.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_314.text: I'm sorry! I hope I didn't do anything wrong!

Intimacy_317.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_317.text: *In the darkness you feel something touch you - icy fingers running down the nape of your neck. You shudder as you feel hot breath on your cheek.*

Intimacy_279.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_279.text: Just relax. Give yourself over to the sensation. Lie back and let it take you.

Intimacy_324.speaker: Narrator
Intimacy_324.text: *Her lips meet yours and you feel your body flush with heat, racing through your limbs, followed by the dancing tingle of her cold fingers.*

Intimacy_228.speaker: Player
Intimacy_228.text: My senses are yours to command.

Intimacy_206.speaker: Player
Intimacy_206.text: What do you mean 'a chance to be embraced in the dark'?

Intimacy_163.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_163.text: It's all part of the experience - the room is bathed in total darkness so there is nothing to distract from your ecstasy.

Intimacy_188.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_188.text: There's no judgement in darkness, no shame, just the sensation of two bodies together in the moment.

Intimacy_6.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_6.text: Your choice! But bear in mind - there are many ways to be intimate. And we don't have to be at all.

Intimacy_26.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_26.text: You can always come back - it's no trouble.

Intimacy_320.speaker: Player
Intimacy_320.text: Can we draw some boundaries first? You start.

Intimacy_198.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_198.text: Well, I should admit to you first that I'm not capable of being as extreme as some might expect... What about you?

Intimacy_204.speaker: Player
Intimacy_204.text: I'll let you know if anything comes up.

Intimacy_305.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_305.text: I'll watch out for you. Now...

Intimacy_275.speaker: Player
Intimacy_275.text: I feel the same way. Nothing too severe.

Intimacy_319.speaker: Player
Intimacy_319.text: Follow my lead. And do it with enthusiasm.

Intimacy_125.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_125.text: I am nothing if not enthusiastic. Now...

Intimacy_281.speaker: Player
Intimacy_281.text: I've only known courtly love. Please, be gentle.

Intimacy_0.speaker: Player
Intimacy_0.text: It's been a long time since I've been able to touch anyone. So nothing too... unexpected.

Intimacy_132.speaker: Nym Orlith
Intimacy_132.text: Thanks for confiding in me. I won't do that. Now...

Intimacy_102.speaker: Player
Intimacy_102.text: There's nothing alluring about pain - I've had my fill of it already, and then some.

Intimacy_59.speaker: Player
Intimacy_59.text: Just don't tell me what to do... It brings back bad memories.

Intimacy_191.speaker: Player
Intimacy_191.text: Er, if you ask me to choke you, I might not stop.

SiblingsThreeWay_281.text: On second thought, this is a bad idea.

SiblingsThreeWay_265.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_265.text: Exquisite! You know the price, right? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

SiblingsThreeWay_282.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_282.text: Mamzell Amira said you could offer your services as a gift of her thanks.

SiblingsThreeWay_192.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_192.text: I'm broke - I'll come back when I can copulate away the party's savings.

SiblingsThreeWay_211.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_211.text: Perhaps I shouldn't do this, never mind.

SiblingsThreeWay_69.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_69.text: Ah, a person of taste indeed.

SiblingsThreeWay_110.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_110.text: Come hither. We have a room upstairs.

SiblingsThreeWay_213.speaker: Shadowheart
SiblingsThreeWay_213.text: Should I be jealous? At least you have good taste.

SiblingsThreeWay_168.speaker: Lae'zel
SiblingsThreeWay_168.text: Bah. You would break our bond for the sake of laying this - this is'lak?

SiblingsThreeWay_186.speaker: Wyll
SiblingsThreeWay_186.text: I thought we were weaving our own tale, you and me. Don't turn your back on it.

SiblingsThreeWay_170.speaker: Gale
SiblingsThreeWay_170.text: I'd prefer you didn't do this. If I'm not enough for you, I could always conjure us some kind of non-sentient companion.

SiblingsThreeWay_235.speaker: Karlach
SiblingsThreeWay_235.text: Have fun, soldier. Leave something left for me later, ey?

SiblingsThreeWay_228.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
SiblingsThreeWay_228.text: If this goes ahead, her luck will run out rather quickly.

SiblingsThreeWay_208.speaker: Halsin
SiblingsThreeWay_208.text: You know my feelings - nature's impulses must be pursued. Do as you will, with my blessing.

SiblingsThreeWay_302.speaker: Halsin
SiblingsThreeWay_302.text: Your gold, and your loins. Not for me to dictate what you do with either.

SiblingsThreeWay_121.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_121.text: Return to us if you have a lover willing to take part.

SiblingsThreeWay_48.speaker: Karlach
SiblingsThreeWay_48.context: NodeContext: Calling the player a degenerate

SiblingsThreeWay_273.speaker: Gale
SiblingsThreeWay_273.text: This is all a bit much for me. Back home in Waterdeep, I prefer to have Tara leave the room before I undress.

SiblingsThreeWay_63.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_63.text: If Gale's not comfortable, I'm not interested.

SiblingsThreeWay_257.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_257.text: You're quite sure? I promise, it would be a tressym-free tryst...

SiblingsThreeWay_268.speaker: Gale
SiblingsThreeWay_268.text: You're adorable even when you're teasing me. But I must decline.

SiblingsThreeWay_122.speaker: Gale
SiblingsThreeWay_122.text: I'd rather tangle with a dragon than get tangled in all those limbs.

SiblingsThreeWay_198.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_198.text: If you're nervous, don't be. I'll be right by your side. Or perhaps on top...

SiblingsThreeWay_1.speaker: Gale
SiblingsThreeWay_1.text: I appreciate that - but I can't help how I feel.

SiblingsThreeWay_163.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_163.text: A shame, but either one of us will be ready for you, if you wish to have us.

SiblingsThreeWay_21.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_21.text: This from the man who wanted us to make love as gods? You must be at least curious...

SiblingsThreeWay_118.speaker: Gale
SiblingsThreeWay_118.text: I might enjoy watching you tangled up with the drow, as long as I was five paces back.

SiblingsThreeWay_83.speaker: Astarion
SiblingsThreeWay_83.text: Ahem. Sorry, pet, I'm not quite comfortable with doing this again yet.

SiblingsThreeWay_50.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_50.text: Don't worry, I wouldn't ask such a thing of you.

SiblingsThreeWay_108.speaker: Astarion
SiblingsThreeWay_108.text: Eugh, don't be so nice to me! It makes me want to be nice back.

SiblingsThreeWay_97.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_97.text: I would have liked to, but I understand.

SiblingsThreeWay_72.speaker: Shadowheart
SiblingsThreeWay_72.text: While it's a fascinating prospect, I'd like you all to myself... at least the first time.

SiblingsThreeWay_15.speaker: Shadowheart
SiblingsThreeWay_15.text: I'm glad. Provided we survive, there's plenty of nights yet to come.
SiblingsThreeWay_15.context: NodeContext: Cheeky extra emphasis on 'to come'

SiblingsThreeWay_290.speaker: Lae'zel
SiblingsThreeWay_290.text: I do not share what is mine. And I will not be shared.

SiblingsThreeWay_295.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_295.text: I couldn't have said it any better.

SiblingsThreeWay_5.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_5.text: Forget I said anything. Let's drop this.

SiblingsThreeWay_253.speaker: Wyll
SiblingsThreeWay_253.text: No, no. I want romance, not - not debauchery.

SiblingsThreeWay_13.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_13.text: You had to spoil the fun, didn't you?

SiblingsThreeWay_166.speaker: Wyll
SiblingsThreeWay_166.text: I value affection over fun, a lasting memory over a passing fancy. This is our story, not theirs.

SiblingsThreeWay_221.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_221.text: It was a bad idea. I'm sorry.

SiblingsThreeWay_300.speaker: Wyll
SiblingsThreeWay_300.text: It's all right, I promise. But I hope when the sun sets and the stars rise, your dreams always lead to me.

SiblingsThreeWay_81.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
SiblingsThreeWay_81.text: I don't like to share. Lay a finger on them, and I'll cut you.

SiblingsThreeWay_114.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_114.text: And I don't want to share you.

SiblingsThreeWay_77.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_77.text: You can cut them if you want, dear.

SiblingsThreeWay_297.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
SiblingsThreeWay_297.text: I was talking about cutting you.

SiblingsThreeWay_112.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_112.text: I would like to hire both of you. And I hope my partner will join us as well.

SiblingsThreeWay_7.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_7.text: I want both of you. At the same time.

SiblingsThreeWay_11.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_11.text: In that case, we will require two of you. And indeed, I suggest it because I have never seen a creature as fair as this pale beau beside you.

SiblingsThreeWay_23.speaker: Astarion
SiblingsThreeWay_23.text: What a world. I never dreamed I'd be on the paying end in a brothel.

SiblingsThreeWay_285.speaker: Astarion
SiblingsThreeWay_285.text: But, our leader here has made the dire mistake of failing to sleep with me so far, and it's a mistake I have been aching to correct.

SiblingsThreeWay_3.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_3.text: Not if it's with him. Not interested.

SiblingsThreeWay_33.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_33.text: My apologies, Astarion, we should correct that mistake!

SiblingsThreeWay_100.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_100.text: I might regret this, but why not.

SiblingsThreeWay_196.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_196.text: Why are you interested in my partner?

SiblingsThreeWay_227.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_227.text: Well, there are two of us, aren't there? Use your imagination.

SiblingsThreeWay_30.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_30.text: Perhaps once we have saved more gold another adventure will begin. We've had busier days, but life is comfortable here with Mamzell.

SiblingsThreeWay_39.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_39.text: As long as you are here of your own free will.

SiblingsThreeWay_38.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_38.text: Life is prosperous. I am much happier kissing the many lips of the surface than tending a field or manning a shop.

SiblingsThreeWay_145.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_145.text: Are you sure this is where you want to be?

SiblingsThreeWay_133.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_133.text: It was not my work itself that has ever been a challenge to me, merely the circumstances.

SiblingsThreeWay_8.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_8.text: I worked in this business in the Underdark, but it grew to festering monotony.

SiblingsThreeWay_229.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_229.text: The entirety of drow culture is obsessed with bondage beyond reason. While such activities have their charms, I yearned to reach greater depths.

SiblingsThreeWay_165.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_165.text: And there is no society on this planet more laterally, imaginatively, and confusingly depraved as that of Baldur's Gate. Although of late, I do feel I've seen everything. Perhaps you'll show me something new?

SiblingsThreeWay_84.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_84.text: No wonder, look at us. We're immaculate.

SiblingsThreeWay_4.speaker: Player
SiblingsThreeWay_4.text: What kind of services do you provide?

SiblingsThreeWay_204.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_204.text: What do you think, silly? Love of course! Hot and vulgar with me, or sweet and sincere with my sister.

SiblingsThreeWay_94.speaker: Halsin
SiblingsThreeWay_94.text: More than interested, if you feel the same.

SiblingsThreeWay_180.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_180.text: There must be some devious thoughts in your mind we can help you explore.

SiblingsThreeWay_70.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_70.text: A new face! Looking for another chapter of dirty lore for your biography?

SiblingsThreeWay_71.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_71.text: You are back with your partner. It would be a delight to spend time with both of you.

SiblingsThreeWay_86.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_86.text: Go forth! Many nights with your partner await you! Our work is done, and we must attend to other clients.

SiblingsThreeWay_34.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_34.text: But I hope you keep coming back to Mamzell's for the drinks!

SiblingsThreeWay_102.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_102.text: You're back! Why don't we try again? Throw our bodies back into the ring!

SiblingsThreeWay_125.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_125.text: You have had my sister, now let my cock bring you the deliverance of the astral plane!

SiblingsThreeWay_169.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_169.text: Ah, I was hoping to see you again.

SiblingsThreeWay_158.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_158.text: My Mezzoberranzan love is always cocked aready.

SiblingsThreeWay_191.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_191.text: Sorry, friend. But you look like you can't take what I mete out. Bring someone with a rear of cast-iron.

SiblingsThreeWay_27.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_27.text: Don't waste a moment, bring your partner. I want to see what you can do.

SiblingsThreeWay_197.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_197.text: You have returned... I hope you are all right after leaving. We are always happy to try again.

SiblingsThreeWay_239.speaker: Sorn Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_239.text: I know that look in your eye. Since being with me, you feel as if you are a Northdark Cavern: a hole that can only be filled by Drow.

SiblingsThreeWay_246.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_246.text: Without the fungal infestations, I hope.

SiblingsThreeWay_304.speaker: Nym Orlith
SiblingsThreeWay_304.text: You survived my brother? Let me know if you want to have a more calming time with me.

AD_Siblings_0.speaker: Nym Orlith
AD_Siblings_0.text: I barely got a moment's sleep last night. And no, not in the good way.

AD_Siblings_2.speaker: Sorn Orlith
AD_Siblings_2.text: Was that human boy insisting on playing his acoustic lute version of High House of Wonders again?

AD_Siblings_1.speaker: Nym Orlith
AD_Siblings_1.text: I hate lute boys. I don't understand why they're such a type for so many.

AD_Siblings_6.speaker: Nym Orlith
AD_Siblings_6.text: The pangs of worry are cast often over Madame Amira nowadays. Do you think we've done something wrong?

AD_Siblings_5.speaker: Sorn Orlith
AD_Siblings_5.text: We are not in trouble, sister.

AD_Siblings_3.speaker: Sorn Orlith
AD_Siblings_3.text: Remember our vow to keep one another safe? When the music stops, you and I - we will continue dancing.

AD_Siblings_8.speaker: Sorn Orlith
AD_Siblings_8.text: There are scant few customers today... This might end up being the first day in years I end with my hand alone for company.

AD_Siblings_4.speaker: Nym Orlith
AD_Siblings_4.text: You keep scaring your regulars off, Sorn.

AD_Siblings_7.speaker: Sorn Orlith
AD_Siblings_7.text: That blacksmith was paying me to use the clamping vice!
